title.narrative: Follow up day 2nd Cooperative Governance Training Indonesia

description.narrative:
Agriterra developed a training on cooperative leadership and governance. After several pilots in Kenya, the first training in Indonesia was organised from 24 to 28 July 2016 in Bogor. The second training in Indonesia was organised from 30 October to 3 November 2016 with participants 3 cooperatives: KPSBU Lembang, KPSP Saluyu and KSU Amanah. As output, the Governance Health Check was filled in by each of the 3 participating cooperatives. Each cooperative elaborated a plan of approach. In the months after the training, the plans were executed by the participants and implemented, assisted by regular coaching of the Agriterra business advisors. Before the three cooperatives present their progress on governance, Agriterra Business Advisors will facilitate a discussion on the governance structure/model in other countries, especially the Netherlands and the Philippines to challenge and provoke mindset of the participants.
